creator: internalerror@gmail.com
text:
A mod_dir generated directory index does not validate as the document type
specified (HTML 3.2). In fact, it does not even validate as HTML 2.0, or any
other document type.

I take it that this was just overlooked over the shrouded mists of time, but
it'd be nice if this could be fixed.

An example would be:

http://validator.w3.org/check?uri=http%3A%2F%2Fpeople.beep-media-player.org%2F%7Emderezynski
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 38180 ***
creator: slive@apache.org
